text: Badin railway station (, Sindhi: بدين ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located at Badin, Sindh, Pakistan. ==Services== The following trains stop at Badin station: ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== Category:Railway stations on Hyderabad–Badin Branch Line Category:Railway stations in Badin District
title: Badin railway station
